body.raw:
{
  "name": "Face Mask",
  "description": "Disposable face mask for medical use",
  "category": "{{category_id}}",
  "brand": "{{brand_id}}",
  "images": ["https://example.com/mask.jpg"],
  "tags": ["mask", "disposable", "medical"],
  "price": 5.99,
  "stock": 100,
  "sku": "HS-001",
  "globalProductName": "Protective Masks"
}

item.name: Add New Product to Existing Global Product (Admin)

body.raw:
{
  "name": "N95 Mask",
  "description": "N95 protective mask for medical use",
  "category": "{{category_id}}",
  "brand": "{{brand_id}}",
  "images": ["https://example.com/n95.jpg"],
  "tags": ["mask", "n95", "medical"],
  "price": 7.99,
  "stock": 50,
  "sku": "N95-001",
  "globalProductId": "{{global_product_id}}",
  "isActive": true
  // Case 1: Global product ID exists but product ID doesn't exist
}

request.description: Add a new product and associate it with an existing global product - Case 1: Global product ID exists but product ID doesn't exist
